page.description: The DataCache object. It has properties and methods needed to manage the grid cache.

property.name: CacheFilePurgeEnabled
property.description: The setting to enable periodic cache file purging. Default is .F.

property.name: CacheFilePurgeFrequencyInMinutes
property.description: The frequency in minutes that a check is done to see if cache items need to be purged. The default is 1,440 minutes (1 day).

property.name: CacheFilePurgeAgeInMinutes
property.description: The age in minutes a cache entry must be in order to be purged. A cache item may exceed this value depending on the purge frequency setting. The default is 1,440 minutes (1 day).

property.name: MaximumRAM
property.description: The maximum about of memory used by the cache in megabytes. The default is 20 MB

property.name: Enabled
property.description: The setting for whether the cache is enabled or not. Defaults to .T.
